input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='GDF Studio Journee 6-Foot Pre-Lit Warm White LED Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Poinsettia and Berry Garland'
  - Name='Worth Imports Indoor Berry Artificial Garland 9136'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9' x 10" Battery Operated Soft White LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Vermont White Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Citi-talent 18 ft. x 5.1 in. Garland with Flashing Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6ft Pine Garland with 9.8ft LED Lights String'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Whitter Pine Garland with LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Pre-Lit Frosted Berry Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine 24-Inch Pre-Lit Wreath with LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pre-lit 9 Ft. Crestwood Spruce Garland With'
  - Name='National Tree Company Christmas Garland Pre-lit With Pine Cones'
  - Name='National Tree Company Winchester Pine Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Glittery Bristle Teardrop Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine 30" Wreath'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Lighted Crystal Glitter Pine Garland With White Tipped'
  - Name='National Tree Company Decorative Collection Elegance Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GDF Studio Journee 6-Foot Pre-Lit Warm White LED Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial garland with LED lights, but shorter length and no detail on branch type or decorations, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An artificial Christmas tree, not a garland; different silhouette and function despite holiday decoration overlap.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Poinsettia and Berry Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial garland with different decorative theme (poinsettia and berries), likely different branch construction and no lighting mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Worth Imports Indoor Berry Artificial Garland 9136
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Berry-themed garland, indoor use, no lighting or pine/cone features; different decorative style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted faux pine garland close in length (6 feet) and function, with lighting and pine materials, relevant but shorter and less detail.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9' x 10" Battery Operated Soft White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical product base (Norwood Fir 9' garland) with battery-operated soft white LED lights like the reference; likely nearly identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial pine garland similar in core function, though no length specified and specifics about branch type missing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Vermont White Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland with similar length, but different pine species (Vermont White Pine), likely similar in function but slightly different branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citi-talent 18 ft. x 5.1 in. Garland with Flashing Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Longer garland with flashing lights, potentially quite different lighting style and branch type unspecified; less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General pre-lit artificial garland from same brand probably similar in construction and function but lacks species and length specifics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6ft Pine Garland with 9.8ft LED Lights String
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter pine garland with LED lights string; similar in purpose but smaller and possibly different lighting setup.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tree product with Carolina Pine but not a garland; different product silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Whitter Pine Garland with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and pine variety garland with LED lights; closely aligned product except for unspecified cashmere branch tips and pine cones.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Pre-Lit Frosted Berry Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland with berries, but different decorative elements than pine cones and mixed branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine 24-Inch Pre-Lit Wreath with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wreath form factor rather than garland, though pre-lit and pine themed; different silhouette and usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pre-lit 9 Ft. Crestwood Spruce Garland With
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit 9-foot spruce garland similar in length and lighting, but different branch type and no mention of pine cones.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Christmas Garland Pre-lit With Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland with pine cones from same brand; likely very similar except branch base and length details not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Winchester Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland from the same brand, likely similar but branch type or lighting details may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Glittery Bristle Teardrop Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft garland with clear lights and glittery bristle tips; related styling and lighting but shorter and glitzy finish differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine 30" Wreath
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wreath product, smaller size and different usage form, though same pine species.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim tree product, not a garland; different form and function despite pine material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Lighted Crystal Glitter Pine Garland With White Tipped
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted pine garland with glitter and white tips; similar in core function but decorative finish differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Decorative Collection Elegance Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorative garland from same brand with elegance emphasis; likely differs in branch type or lighting, less specific info.
